episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4001_100:
Come on! I’ll beat you down and beat you down
some more!

Looks like Golisopod’s about to use First
Impression! It works only when the user’s just
entered a battle, but it deals massive damage!
Watch out, Lunatone! Dodge it!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4001_040:
You can get crushed with the rest of ’em!
Go, Golisopod!

Hah, that’s a good one! You can get crushed with
the rest of ’em! Go, Golisopod!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4001_100: Oh, no you don’t! Salamence, go!

Well, we fought hard, but victory eluded us this
time. Liza and [Name:PlayerNickname ],
are you all right?
I’m fine! I can still fight!
Mr. Guzma, can we have a rema—
No way! You ain’t worth the time!
Fighting you’s a waste of a beatdown!

A bunch of boulders would make a better
opponent than you!
That’s enough! Both of you!

Liza, I can’t fault your enthusiasm, but you can’t
go charging into battles so recklessly.
As for you, Guzma...

Why can’t you get a sentence out without being
so menacing?

Shut up! That’s just how big bad Guzma is! If you
don’t like it, stay out of my business!
Oh, honestly, I’ve just about had it with you.

Tell me, Liza—why all this rush to get
stronger, anyway?
’Cause...I made a promise with my brother, Tate.

We agreed we’d both work to stand on our own
two feet.

If I want to get to that point, I have to become
stronger. Strong enough to fight on my own—

If that’s your goal, then fighting like you did just
now won’t get you far.
Plumeria? What’re you doing here?

How sweet. Nice to see you, too. I was just
passing through and heard a commotion, so I
thought I’d come see what’s up.

And what should I find but you bullying this
little girl.

You oughta be ashamed, picking on weaker
people like that. What kind of look is that for the
leader of Team Skull?
Huh? What do you mean by “weaker people?!”

They’ve got one of the Hoenn Elite Four with ’em!
That’s supposed to be “weak?”

Oh, wow. You’re with the Hoenn Elite Four,
huh, old-timer?
But the little girl’s another story, isn’t she?

Hey! I-I’m no weakling! I’m a Gym Leader
in Hoenn!
I mean...when I’m with Tate I am, anyway...
Guh! Wipe that pitiful look off your face!
Do you wanna get stronger or not?
I do... I do want to!
Then quit whimpering!
I swear. That’s our boss—delicate as a hammer.
Still, he’s got a point.

If you wanna change, you’d better face your goal
head-on, or you’ll miss out on the important stuff.

You’re right! Thanks, Mr. Guzma! Thanks,
Ms. Plumeria!
Heh! Save your thanks, kid!
Hey, you there! Face me in battle!

Hey, Plumeria and [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Gimme a hand here!

I think I know what you’ve got in mind. Time for a
Pokémon battle, right?

You got that right! If you wanna be strong, first
you better see what strength looks like!

And if you wanna see strength, big bad Guzma’s
your boy! I’ll beat you down, then beat you down
some more!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4002_110:
Liza watched Guzma and the others battle
again and again, hoping it would help her 
grow stronger.
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4002_100:
So! What do you think of the might of big bad
Guzma and Golisopod?
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4002_040:
Look who’s talking, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You weren’t so bad yourself.

I’ll admit it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]—you can
destroy with the best of ’em!
That was so, so cool! Amazing!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4002_100: How do I become that strong?!
Do I just have to wait until I’m grown-up?
Or is there some kind of trick to it?

Grrr! I just want to be strong like you and the
others, Mr. Guzma!
Oh! I know! Take me as your apprentice!
Huh? No way! Completely outta the question!
Awww! How come?!
I-I don’t take apprentices, kid. Personal policy.
Personal policy, huh? First I’ve heard of it.
Shut up! You keep outta this!
Look, no apprentices for me! End of story!

If you wanna get stronger, use your own power
to do something about it!
Awww. But I was really hoping you’d teach me.
Why not make an exception just this once?

Y’know, she may be different in a lot of key
ways, but...

she kind of reminds me of our cute numskulls back
home. It wouldn’t feel right to just leave her in the
lurch, would it?
Listen up, kid.

I’ll say it one last time—big bad Guzma doesn’t
take apprentices...

But this time, and this time only, I guess I wouldn’t
mind...not refusing you.
Just can’t give a simple yes, can you?
Keep it to yourself!

So what’s it gonna be? It’s now or never! You
gonna watch me do my thing or not?

Yes, please! I’m glad to have even one chance.
Thank you so much!
Ngh!
Sheesh!

Hmm. Seems like pure and simple gratitude knocks
him off-balance.

Isn’t this nice, Liza? But I wonder... How exactly is
this training going to work?

Shut it! I’ll tell you how it’ll work: beatdowns and
more beatdowns!

Now watch carefully. I’ll give you one more look
at big bad Guzma’s brand of destruction!

You gotta learn the trick to it with your own
two eyes!

Here goes! Look alive, Plumeria and
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Time for some
full-blast destruction!

Yeah yeah, Salazzle and I have already followed
you this far. We might as well keep goin’ till
you’re satisfied.
You’re up first, Drake! Hope you’re ready for us!

Well, that suits me fine. But weren’t you the victor
when we battled just minutes ago?

Oh, c’mon! You think beating someone who was
busy protecting a kid counts as a win?

I wanna be able to say I beat down one of the
Hoenn Elite Four fair and square!
Wah ha ha!

I see, I see. Well then, see what you make of
Drake, the Dragon master of the Hoenn Elite Four!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4003_100:
Well? That oughta be enough watching to start
picking up a knack for destruction!
For real?! What don’t you get about it?
You big dummy. What good is just watching?

Tell me, Liza. Do you know the difference between
how you battle and how we battle?
I’m sorry... I don’t.

How about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Any thoughts?
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4003_040: Well, that idea’s both nice and troubling.
Heh. You hit the nail on the head!

There ain’t nobody who can match me when it
comes to destructive spirit!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4003_100: Hey! Kid!
Y-yes, sir!

If watching won’t cut it, better try it for yourself!
Get ready for a battle with big bad Guzma!
Yes, sir! Th-thank you, sir!

So! How come you keep losing? Find the answer
yet, kid?
Because I just can’t pull myself together!

I know I need to be able to stand on my own two
feet without Tate...
but maybe I just can’t cut it without him after all?
Gaaah! Come on—that ain’t it!

Now listen good, kid! Is it your brother’s fault
you’re not strong?

No! The only person keeping you from winning
is you!

You convinced yourself you’re a certain way, and
you shut yourself up in your own shell because
of it!
Hold on now, Guzma...

Now you’ve gotta break that shell for yourself! Be
the one to smash it wide open!
I’m weak...because I shut myself inside my shell?
I just convinced myself of something...

I convinced myself that without Tate, I have to be
able to stand all on my own!
Mr. Guzma! Let’s battle again!
All better now, are we, Liza?

Yes, I’m all right! And I won’t go down so easily
this time!

Heh! If we’re doing this, we’re doing it right. You
better bring some destruction yourself!
Yes! I’m ready to get destroyed, full blast!
Uh, that doesn’t sound like quite the right attitude.
But hey, if you’re ready, then bring it!

Very well. Then as an Elite Four member, allow
me to see this battle through.

Now fix your heart straight and true! Victory’s
yours if you can reach out and seize it!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_100: Well, we lost...but it was fun anyway!
Indeed. That was one mighty-fine battle.

Thanks, Mr. Guzma and Ms. Plumeria!
You too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Don’t mention it. We got a good battle out of it, so
it was a good deal for us, too.
Right, Guzma?

Feh. I didn’t get to beat you down as bad as I
really meant to.
Hehe. Thank you!

Hmm. I suspect I know what held Liza back from
beating Guzma the first time.

She may have been too caught up trying to figure
out what her place was in team battles and how
she should fight.
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_040:
All her life, she’s been fighting side by side with
her twin brother.
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_030: Because of this new fighting style?
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_040:
Exactly. She’s always fought side by side with her
twin brother.
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_100:
They worked so well as a team, they didn’t even
need to talk, and Liza could fight the way that
felt natural.

With her brother gone, she was all alone. She
couldn’t find a natural-feeling way to fight.
So she couldn’t find the strength she normally—
Nah. That ain’t it.

Here on Pasio, we battle three-on-three, which
means you’re never fighting alone.

She’s used to fighting with her brother, so she
oughta be a natural at working with other
sync pairs.
But she couldn’t see the people by her side!

She thought she was alone, so she was convinced
she couldn’t cut it...even though this style of
battling was practically made for her!

That’s what I mean when I say she built her
own shell!

But that battle just now was different. She started
believing in her teammates and focusing on
bringing the beatdown!

So basically, she quit sweating the small stuff
and fought without doubts eating at her.

But besides, you’ve got someone right nearby that
understands you pretty well, right, Liza?
What? But Tate’s not here...
Oh, c’mon. What about your partner?
O-oh, of course! I’m sorry, Lunatone...

I bet Lunatone wants to be a source of support for
you, too, not just the other way around.
Don’t forget that!
You’re right!
Good. You gonna be all right now?
Well, I taught her, so how could she not be?
Hehe. I’m glad to have such a kind mentor!

Buh?! Who you callin’— I’m nobody’s mentor...
let alone a “kind” one!

I’ve learned so much from your wise mentorship!
I’ll make sure to treasure your teachings!
And I’ll keep this destructive spirit alive!
Well, isn’t that nice, oh wise mentor?
Wise and kind mentor, at that!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_040: Shut up, shut up, shut up! All of you!
I told you, big bad Guzma takes no apprentices!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_030:
Thanks for being our beatdown
mentor, Guzma!
episode_event_guzma_plumeria_01/4004_040:
Hey, shut up! You ain’t my apprentice! Quit taking
advantage of my distraction!
